abstract: Global stock markets bounced back last week, and on Wall Street the three major stock indexes posted healthy gains.
snippet: Global stock markets bounced back last week, and on Wall Street the three major stock indexes posted healthy gains.
lead_paragraph: Global stock markets bounced back last week, and on Wall Street the three major stock indexes posted healthy gains.

headline.main: Major Indexes Gain as Global Markets Rebound
headline.print_headline: Major Indexes Gain as Global Markets Rebound

abstract: Market volatility has returned with a vengeance, raising fears that a full-blown market correction could be imminent.
snippet: Market volatility has returned with a vengeance, raising fears that a full-blown market correction could be imminent.
lead_paragraph: AFTER starting the year on a positive note, the markets began to backtrack on fears of economic troubles ahead. At the same time, a fresh round of geopolitical concerns pushed oil prices above $60 a barrel. And market volatility returned with a vengeance, raising fears that a full-blown market correction could be imminent.

headline.main: This Time, the Turbulence May Last Awhile
headline.print_headline: This Time, the Turbulence May Last Awhile
